title: Surprise Mother F***** I'm home
itunes:title: Surprise Mother F***** I'm home
description:
Thursday 8/30 - Today on the show after news broke about Kanye West apologizing for his slave comments, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners had forgave him, and there was definitely some mix responses. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman encouraging toddlers to smoke weed and today on Ask Yee, you can almost say The Breakfast Club did a live cheaters show, as a listener called us as she caught her man cheating on her at their house, what happened next, we may never know. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 8/30 - Today on the show after news broke about Kanye West apologizing for his slave comments, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners had forgave him, and there was definitely some mix responses. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman encouraging toddlers to smoke weed and today on Ask Yee, you can almost say The Breakfast Club did a live cheaters show, as a listener called us as she caught her man cheating on her at their house, what happened next, we may never know.
